1268470.name: Fantasy Grounds - Devin Night TP128: Fiendish Foes
1268470.description:
Devin Night TP128: Fiendish Foes

TP128 Fiendish Foes, This pack contains 31 hand-drawn and colored tokens of a variety of demons and fiends and the people that seek their company. Suitable for most fantasy settings.
This product includes:
  • Angel Collector
  • Dead Angel Striker
  • Death Knight
  • Demon Insect Skull
  • 2 Demonic Heroes
  • 2 Demon Princes
  • Fiend Knight
  • Harpy Warrior
  • 2 Lamia
  • Lich
  • Male Human Orcus Cleric
  • Male Human Orcus Fighter
  • Male Human Orcus Priest
  • Metal Blade Demon
  • Swamp Monster
  • 3 Tengu
  • Thing with Face
  • 2 Witch
  • Witch Bugs
  • Witch Faceless
  • Witch Moon
  • Witch Seer
  • 2 Zombie Super
Converted by:  
James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
